Train Model¶

This is the first function that should be used after collecting training data. It calls clean_training_data() to correctly format the data placed in the surrender20/development/data/interim directory. It then creates the model and stores it in pickle files that are used by predict_response().

train_model.train_model()¶

Fit a logistic regression model on the training data to classify either a win or loss.

Returns:two pickle files for the prediction model, cl.pkl and scaler.pkl
